meanings.definition: Any grass of the genus Bromus.
meanings.sent1: The field was filled with tall bromegrasses.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use bromegrasses to feed their livestock.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits played hide and seek among the bromegrasses.
meanings.sent4: The wind whispered secrets as it rustled through the bromegrasses.
meanings.sent5: The golden hue of the bromegrasses glowed in the setting sun.

meanings.definition: A grass of the genus Bromus.
meanings.sent1: The botanist identified the unique features of the bromegrasses.
meanings.sent2: The park was adorned with beautiful bromegrasses.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the bromegrasses were a forest in their imaginative play.
meanings.sent4: The bromegrasses danced gracefully in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh rain mingled with the scent of the bromegrasses.
